title: How to Play Phasmophobia VR on Oculus Quest 2: Easy Guide

steps.title: Download the Oculus app onto your computer.
steps.content: Download the Oculus app onto your computer. You can find the download on the official website here . This program is needed to connect your Oculus headset to your computer. You should already have Steam and Phasmophobia downloaded. If you don't, install it first . [1] X Research source

steps.title: Download SteamVR
steps.content: Download SteamVR . You can find this in the Steam library. Search for "SteamVR" and download it to your computer.

steps.title: Open the Oculus app on your computer.
steps.content: Open the Oculus app on your computer. This should be open while you connect your Oculus via Air Link. If you're using a wired cable, simply plug your Oculus into your computer to connect it.

steps.title: Put on the Oculus headset and navigate to Settings.
steps.content: Put on the Oculus headset and navigate to Settings . This will be in the top-left corner of the Apps window. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Toggle on Air Link.
steps.content: Toggle on Air Link . This will be on the Features tab. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Select Continue.
steps.content: Select Continue . A new window will open with a menu.

steps.title: Select Oculus Air Link.
steps.content: Select Oculus Air Link . This is the square on the right side of the window.

steps.title: Select your computer name and select Pair.
steps.content: Select your computer name and select Pair . You should see your computer name underneath the Available PCs header. [4] X Research source This will take a moment to connect. When it does, you'll see a code on both your computer and headset.

steps.title: Select Confirm.
steps.content: Select Confirm . Make sure the codes match. If they do not match, select Cancel and try again. Make sure you're selecting the correct computer. [5] X Research source Your Oculus headset is now connected to your computer.

steps.title: On the Oculus, select Desktop.
steps.content: On the Oculus, select Desktop . This should be in the row of apps at the bottom of the screen. You'll need to use the Oculus to open the necessary programs through your computer.

steps.title: On the Oculus, find SteamVr and select Launch.
steps.content: On the Oculus, find SteamVr and select Launch . SteamVR will open with a completely new background. The window will show your Steam library. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Select Phasmophobia.
steps.content: Select Phasmophobia . This may take a moment depending on your computer. The game will launch on your Oculus headset. You can now play Phasmophobia in VR. For the best, immersive experience, use headphones as you play.
